p: The EAG responses differed strongly between the two different groups of bees (GLM: F 1,114 = 25.17, P < 0.0001) and the substances tested (GLM: F 8,114 = 29.22, P < 0.0001). Newly emerged bees responded more weakly overall to substances than the forager bees (Fig. 2). The only difference between both (newly emerged vs. forager), on the level of single substance comparison, was observed for geranyl acetate where forager bees responded much more strongly than the others (Bonferroni post-hoc test, P = 0.0001) (Fig. 2).
